actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-596.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 378 - 0 (Record Vote No: 26).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of bill (H.R. 2899) to authorize appropriations for environmental research, development, and demonstration for the fiscal years 1984 and 1985, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2899 (Environmental Protection Agency funding).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of bill (H.R. 2899) to authorize appropriations for environmental research, development, and demonstration for the fiscal years 1984 and 1985, and for other purposes.
